field.name: start_datetime
field.eval: pytz.timezone(obj().env.user.tz or 'UTC').localize(DateTime.today().date() + relativedelta(days=-6, weekday=0) + relativedelta(days=0, hour=10)).astimezone(pytz.UTC).replace(tzinfo=None)
